defs.docs: An implementation of the [`Groth16`] zkSNARK.

attributes.value: / An implementation of the [`Groth16`] zkSNARK.
/ [`Groth16`]: https://eprint.iacr.org/2016/260.pdf
no_std

warn(unused, future_incompatible, nonstandard_style, rust_2018_idioms,
       missing_docs)
allow(clippy :: many_single_char_names, clippy :: op_ref)
forbid(unsafe_code)

 at the expense of larger size in memory.

pub fn generate_random_parameters<E, C, R>(C, &mut R)
-> R1CSResult<ProvingKey<E>> where E: PairingEngine,
C: ConstraintSynthesizer<E::Fr>, R: Rng
defs.docs:
Generates a random common reference string for
 a circuit.

                           R>(C, E::Fr, E::Fr, E::Fr, E::Fr, E::G1Projective,
                              E::G2Projective, &mut R)
-> R1CSResult<ProvingKey<E>> where E: PairingEngine,
C: ConstraintSynthesizer<E::Fr>, R: Rng

defs.name: create_random_proof
defs.value:
pub fn create_random_proof<E, C, R>(C, &ProvingKey<E>, &mut R)
-> R1CSResult<Proof<E>> where E: PairingEngine,
C: ConstraintSynthesizer<E::Fr>, R: Rng
defs.docs:
Create a Groth16 proof that is zero-knowledge.
 This method samples randomness for zero knowledges via `rng`.

attributes.value: / Create a Groth16 proof that is zero-knowledge.
/ This method samples randomness for zero knowledges via `rng`.
inline

defs.value:
pub fn create_proof_no_zk<E, C>(C, &ProvingKey<E>) -> R1CSResult<Proof<E>>
where E: PairingEngine, C: ConstraintSynthesizer<E::Fr>
defs.docs: Create a Groth16 proof that is *not* zero-knowledge.

attributes.value: / Create a Groth16 proof that is *not* zero-knowledge.

defs.name: create_proof
defs.value:
pub fn create_proof<E, C>(C, &ProvingKey<E>, E::Fr, E::Fr)
-> R1CSResult<Proof<E>> where E: PairingEngine,
C: ConstraintSynthesizer<E::Fr>
defs.docs: Create a Groth16 proof using randomness `r` and `s`.

attributes.value: / Create a Groth16 proof using randomness `r` and `s`.
inline

defs.name: rerandomize_proof
defs.value:
pub fn rerandomize_proof<E, R>(&mut R, &VerifyingKey<E>, &Proof<E>)
-> Proof<E> where E: PairingEngine, R: Rng
defs.docs:
Given a Groth16 proof, returns a fresh proof of the same statement. For a proof π of a
 statement S, the output of the non-deterministic procedure `rerandomize_proof(π)` is
 statistically indistinguishable from a fresh honest proof of S. For more info, see theorem 3 of
 [\[BKSV20\]](https://eprint.iacr.org/2020/811)

attributes.value: / Given a Groth16 proof, returns a fresh proof of the same statement. For a proof π of a
/ statement S, the output of the non-deterministic procedure `rerandomize_proof(π)` is
/ statistically indistinguishable from a fresh honest proof of S. For more info, see theorem 3 of
/ [\[BKSV20\]](https://eprint.iacr.org/2020/811)

defs.name: verifier
defs.docs: Verify proofs for the Groth16 zkSNARK construction.

attributes.value: / Verify proofs for the Groth16 zkSNARK construction.

defs.name: prepare_verifying_key
defs.docs: Prepare the verifying key `vk` for use in proof verification.

attributes.value: / Prepare the verifying key `vk` for use in proof verification.

defs.name: prepare_inputs
defs.docs:
Prepare proof inputs for use with [`verify_proof_with_prepared_inputs`], wrt the prepared
 verification key `pvk` and instance public inputs.

attributes.value: / Prepare proof inputs for use with [`verify_proof_with_prepared_inputs`], wrt the prepared
/ verification key `pvk` and instance public inputs.

defs.name: verify_proof_with_prepared_inputs
defs.docs:
Verify a Groth16 proof `proof` against the prepared verification key `pvk` and prepared public
 inputs. This should be preferred over [`verify_proof`] if the instance's public inputs are
 known in advance.

attributes.value: / Verify a Groth16 proof `proof` against the prepared verification key `pvk` and prepared public
/ inputs. This should be preferred over [`verify_proof`] if the instance's public inputs are
/ known in advance.

defs.name: verify_proof
defs.docs:
Verify a Groth16 proof `proof` against the prepared verification key `pvk`,
 with respect to the instance `public_inputs`.

attributes.value: / Verify a Groth16 proof `proof` against the prepared verification key `pvk`,
/ with respect to the instance `public_inputs`.
